in_ports.name: rectangular_area
in_ports.caption: rect. area
in_ports.hint:
[Optional] If specified, it defines rectangular area to be filled:
all coordinates, specified in arguments, are ignored.

controls.name: percents
controls.description: If true, all numbers below are measured in percents of image sizes (right=100 means right bound of image etc.)

controls.name: left
controls.description: Specifies x₁ (in pixels or percents) for submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂ (and z₁≤z≤z₂ fro ≥3D)

controls.name: top
controls.description: Specifies y₁ (in pixels or percents) for submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂ (and z₁≤z≤z₂ fro ≥3D)

controls.name: front
controls.description: (For ≥3D) Specifies z₁ (in pixels or percents) for submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂ (and z₁≤z≤z₂ fro ≥3D)

controls.name: right
controls.description: Specifies x₂ (in pixels or percents) for submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂ (and z₁≤z≤z₂ fro ≥3D); if x₂<0, it is replaced with dimX+x₂ (where dimX is image width); ignored if width>0

controls.name: bottom
controls.description: Specifies y₂ (in pixels or percents) for submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂ (and z₁≤z≤z₂ fro ≥3D); if y₂<0, it is replaced with dimY+y₂ (where dimY is image height); ignored if height>0

controls.name: rear
controls.description: (For ≥3D) Specifies z₂ (in pixels or percents) for submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂ (and z₁≤z≤z₂ fro ≥3D); if z₂<0, it is replaced with dimZ+z₂; ignored if depth>0

controls.name: width
controls.description: If width>0, it overrides x₂ above and specifies result width x₂−x₁+1 (in pixels or percents) of submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂ (and z₁≤z≤z₂ fro ≥3D); ignored if zero

controls.name: height
controls.description: If height>0, it overrides y₂ above and specifies result height y₂−y₁+1 (in pixels or percents) of submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂ (and z₁≤z≤z₂ fro ≥3D); ignored if zero

controls.name: depth
controls.description: (For ≥3D) If depth>0, it overrides z₂ above and specifies result height z₂−z₁+1 (in pixels or percents) of submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂ (and z₁≤z≤z₂ fro ≥3D); ignored if zero

controls.name: color
controls.caption: Color
controls.description:
Supported color formats:
    #FF0000 — HTML standard RRGGBBB without alpha (red color)
    #FF000080 — HTML standard RRGGBBBAA with alpha (red color with alpha 0.5)
    0xFF0000 — hexadecimal RRGGBBB, alpha not allowed (red color)
    (1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5) — all channels (normalized to 0.0..1.0), alpha allowed (red color with alpha 0.5)
    [255, 173, 0] — raw (non-normalized) values for each channels, alpha allowed
    0.5 — grayscale (normalized to 0.0..1.0)

controls.name: grayscaleValue
controls.caption: Grayscale value
controls.description: Grayscale value is used instead of "color", if "color" is an empty string.

controls.name: rawGrayscaleValue
controls.caption: Raw grayscale value
controls.description: If true, grayscale value is "raw" (not normalized), if false, it should be in 0..1 range
